author: MSNBC.com
title: Ferguson Mayor: I didn’t run as a black person, I ran as a citizen of Ferguson
description: Mayor Ella Jones, the first black person elected as mayor of a city made famous by the killing of Michael Brown in 2014, tells NBC’s Kasie Hunt it’s an 'honor and a privilege' to be leading her community during a national movement for social justice.

author: MSNBC.com
title: Dennis Carroll: Americans are tired of social distancing but ‘the virus is not fatiguing’
description: Dennis Carroll, former director of the Emerging Threats Unit at USAID, says the coronavirus remains 'robust and highly transmissible' as states across the country loosen restrictions.
source.name: MSNBC

title: Rep. Jayapal: Supreme Court showed ‘how badly the administration overstepped’ on DACA

source.name: MSNBC

author: MSNBC.com
title: Harold Reynolds: ‘There will be baseball, one way or the other’

title: NY AG calls video of apparent chokehold by NYPD officer ‘very troubling’

author: MSNBC.com
title: Sen. Jones: Trump firing of U.S. attorney is ‘déjà vu all over again’

author: MPX
title: During rally, Trump talks about ramp walk, drinking water
